name: Protect The Catcher!
description:
You are the baseball player, protecting the catcher, who guess what, can't catch! Your job is to protect the catcher by hitting the ball wherever the ball goes. The darker areas are hitboxes, that way you know where to hit.  Start the game by pressing the spacebar and the pitcher will pitch. DON"T SPAM! 

Debug- If the pitcher doesn't pitch for some reason, press the space bar.

Controls- Down arrow key = Down      Left arrow key = Middle     Up arrow key = Up     Spacebar = Hit
